reviews.review_msg: She is definitely bias towards certain students as well as not being able to control her emotions when putting her input in critiques and grades. Overall, the head faculty members should really address the fact that her opinions and favoritism towards certain students definitely defers the learning with these classes.

I completely disagree with the poor ratings, I have had Allyson as a teacher multiple times and she has always been an excellent teacher.  She is understanding, helpful, kind, and has a high level of expertise in visual arts.  I know most of the students in my classes feel the same way as well.
Really quite a bad person - will go out of his way to make other's lives difficult and unhappy - all with a smile and feigned concern.  Loves to point fingers and assign blame.
